title: Puller Trying to chmod lost+found.  Why ?

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
I'm trying to sync two Linux _ext3_ file systems.

Each has a _lost+found_ directory that is, by convention, _root:root_ and _drwx------_.  So they are in sync.  Each is empty.  I can see this:  they have a link count is 2.

The log, however, reports

```
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Desperation mode ON
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 INFO: Puller (folder "media-backup", dir "lost+found"): chmod /media/local/backup/lost+found: operation not permitted
[ZEYUB] 22:52:23 WARNING: Folder "media-backup" isn't making progress - check logs for possible root cause. Pausing puller for 1m0s.
```

I can't think of a reason why is should want to do _chmod_ on the the directory unless it is some misguided attempt to find out what the directory contains.

I've tried using _.stgnore_ on both hosts in an effort to work around this:

```
 lost+found
 lost+found/
 lost+found/*
```

none of these avoid the unwanted _chmod_.

So, using Holmesian deduction I tried:

```
lost*
```

This allows _syncthing_ to complete its synchronisation but the expression is too general and some other file or directory that should not be ignored might be.
